SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LeadFormulaAcquisto] ( [LeadFormulaAcquisto_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_Titolo] varchar(MAX) NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_Default] bit NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_Codice] varchar(MAX) NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_Ordine] int NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_UserInsert] int NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_UserUpdate] int NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_UserDelete] int NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [LeadFormulaAcquisto_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[LeadFormulaAcquisto] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_LeadFormulaAcquisto PRIMARY KEY ([LeadFormulaAcquisto_Ky])
